text: Philip Brennan (born 30 July 1983 in Tulla, County Clare) is an Irish sportsperson. He plays hurling with his local club Tulla and has been the goalkeeper on the Clare senior inter-county team since 2007. He works as a Hurley Maker for John Torpey Woodturning Ltd. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Tulla hurlers (Clare) Category:Clare inter-county hurlers Category:Hurling goalkeepers
title: Philip Brennan (Clare hurler)
